pages.text: Hybrids are the perfect fusion of Vampire and Werewolf abilities. They are immune to vervain, cannot be compelled, and possess the best of both worlds.

pages.title: Becoming a Hybrid
pages.text: A Hybrid can only be created by an Original Vampire through a unique ritual.

pages.title: Abilities
pages.text:
- Blood Rage Mode 
- Werewolf Claws 
- Hybrid Roar (Stuns enemies) 
- Shadow Leap
